hr.fer.zemris.java.custom.scripting.lexer

Class EscapeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.custom.scripting.lexer.EscapeManager

  • public class EscapeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages escape characters found in files Lexer can tokenize.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic

    • Method Detail

      • EscapeFromText

        public static char EscapeFromText(char character)
        Creates a new value from given character. Supports \ and { as escapable characters. Throws LexerException for all others.
        Parameters:
        character - character we want escaped
        Returns:
        returns the escaped character

      • EscapeFromString

        public static char EscapeFromString(char character)
        Creates new value from given character. Supports \, ", n, r and t as escapable characters. Throws LexerException for all others.
        Parameters:
        character - character we want escaped
        Returns:
        returns the escaped character
